author: Special Correspondent
text:
A couple died after they reportedly jumped into a farm well at Marudhadi village near here in the late hours on Wednesday.

The names of the victims were given as N. Sivasamy (64) and S. Thavamani (55) were staying in a house surrounded by farm lands.

Sivasamy was said to be mentally disturbed and came out of the house in the odd hours and suddenly jumped into the farm well. His wife Thavamani came out apparently in search of her husband and jumped into the well as well.

On a complaint from the couple’s son S. Anbazhagan (34), the Perambalur Police have registered a case.
title: Couple die after jumping into well
